description: Start your layering system with their most innovative foundation to date; their Intraknit collection. Their Men's Intraknit Thermal Merino Base Layer Bottom puts warmth first, while seamlessly knit mesh ventilation helps keep you dry and comfortable. Their revolutionary 3D mapping provides maximum mobility and ribbed elbows provide added durability , so nothing slows you down. Gear up to take on any weather with these men's Merino wool pants.
name: Smartwool Intraknit Thermal Merino 200 Base Layer Bottoms - Mens

specs.value: 52% Merino Wool, 44% Polyester, 2% Elastane, 2% Polyamide. Exclusive Of Decoration
Insulation, articulation, and ventilation are seamlessly integrated to amplify movement and comfort during high-intensity activities
